name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this capability statement when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this capability statement is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the capability statement. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this capability statement when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this capability statement is (or w

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the capability statement when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the capability statement author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the capability statement when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the capability statement author and is not expected to be globally

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying the capability statement. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the capability statement. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the capability statement.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the capability statement.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of this capability statement. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of this capability statement. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A boolean value to indicate that this capability statement is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A boolean value to indicate that this capability statement is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the capability statement was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the capability statement changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the capability statement was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the cap

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the individual or organization that published the capability statement.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the individual or organization that published the capability statement.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the capability statement from a consumer's perspective. Typically, this is used when the capability statement describes a desired rather than an actual solution, for example as a formal expression of requirements as part of an RFP.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the capability statement from a consumer's perspective. Typically, this is used when the capability statement describes a desired rather than an actual solution, for example as a formal expression of requirement

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate capability statement instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate capability statement instances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate capability statement instances.

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the capability statement is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the capability statement is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the capability statement is intended to be used.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explaination of why this capability statement is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explaination of why this capability statement is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: A copyright statement relating to the capability statement and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the capability statement.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the capability statement and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the capability statement.

name: $kind
desc: Returns: The way that this statement is intended to be used, to describe an actual running instance of software, a particular product (kind not instance of software) or a class of implementation (e.g. a desired purchase).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The way that this statement is intended to be used, to describe an actual running instance of software, a particular product (kind not instance of software) or a class of implementation (e.g. a desired purchase).

name: $instantiates
desc: Returns: Reference to a canonical URL of another CapabilityStatement that this software implements or uses. This capability statement is a published API description that corresponds to a business service. The rest of the capability statement does not need to repeat the details of the referenced resource, but can do so.

name: $addinstantiates
desc: Reference to a canonical URL of another CapabilityStatement that this software implements or uses. This capability statement is a published API description that corresponds to a business service. The rest of the capability statement does not need to repeat the details of the referenced resource, but can do so.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Reference to a canonical URL of another CapabilityStatement that this software implements or uses. This capability statement is a published API description that corresponds to a business service. The rest of the capability statement does not need to repea

name: $software
desc: Returns: Software that is covered by this capability statement.  It is used when the capability statement describes the capabilities of a particular software version, independent of an installation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Software that is covered by this capability statement.  It is used when the capability statement describes the capabilities of a particular software version, independent of an installation.

name: $implementation
desc: Returns: Identifies a specific implementation instance that is described by the capability statement - i.e. a particular installation, rather than the capabilities of a software program.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies a specific implementation instance that is described by the capability statement - i.e. a particular installation, rather than the capabilities of a software program.

name: $fhirVersion
desc: Returns: The version of the FHIR specification on which this capability statement is based.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The version of the FHIR specification on which this capability statement is based.

name: $acceptUnknown
desc: Returns: A code that indicates whether the application accepts unknown elements or extensions when reading resources.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code that indicates whether the application accepts unknown elements or extensions when reading resources.

name: $format
desc: Returns: A list of the formats supported by this implementation using their content types.

name: $addformat
desc: A list of the formats supported by this implementation using their content types.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A list of the formats supported by this implementation using their content types.

name: $patchFormat
desc: Returns: A list of the patch formats supported by this implementation using their content types.

name: $addpatchFormat
desc: A list of the patch formats supported by this implementation using their content types.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A list of the patch formats supported by this implementation using their content types.

name: $implementationGuide
desc: Returns: A list of implementation guides that the server does (or should) support in their entirety.

name: $addimplementationGuide
desc: A list of implementation guides that the server does (or should) support in their entirety.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A list of implementation guides that the server does (or should) support in their entirety.

name: $profile
desc: Returns: A list of profiles that represent different use cases supported by the system. For a server, "supported by the system" means the system hosts/produces a set of resources that are conformant to a particular profile, and allows clients that use its services to search using this profile and to find appropriate data. For a client, it means the system will search by this profile and process data according to the guidance implicit in the profile. See further discussion in [Using Profiles](profiling.html#profile-uses).

name: $addprofile
desc: A list of profiles that represent different use cases supported by the system. For a server, "supported by the system" means the system hosts/produces a set of resources that are conformant to a particular profile, and allows clients that use its services to search using this profile and to find appropriate data. For a client, it means the system will search by this profile and process data according to the guidance implicit in the profile. See further discussion in [Using Profiles](profiling.html#profile-uses).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A list of profiles that represent different use cases supported by the system. For a server, "supported by the system" means the system hosts/produces a set of resources that are conformant to a particular profile, and allows clients that use its services

name: $rest
desc: Returns: A definition of the restful capabilities of the solution, if any.

name: $addrest
desc: A definition of the restful capabilities of the solution, if any.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A definition of the restful capabilities of the solution, if any.

name: $messaging
desc: Returns: A description of the messaging capabilities of the solution.

name: $addmessaging
desc: A description of the messaging capabilities of the solution.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A description of the messaging capabilities of the solution.

name: $document
desc: Returns: A document definition.

name: $adddocument
desc: A document definition.
